segments.text: Which university did you graduate from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What subject did you major in at university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tell me about the courses of your major in university .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I take more than 50 courses in university , including microeconomics , macroeconomics , marketing principles , sales management , statistics , and so on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How did you get on with your studies in university ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did well in university . I was one of the top students in the class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What subject did you minor in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't minor in any subject when I was in university , but I attended English and computer courses . And I am currently studying finance in a training school .
segments.speaker: S2
